Title: Why tuples in C# are not always a code smell
Description: Today's article will focus on tuples and show examples of tuples in C# being a code smell. But also, I want to point out when tuples can actually help you make your code more readable and cleaner. The trick is not to mistake tuples for the hammer for every screw out there. Let me show you how.

Description: Zero Trust is a security concept that questions the traditional perimeter-based security architecture.
